mapper.insert: insert into user(id, pass, name, phone,email,birth,user_nickname) values(#{id},#{pass},#{name},#{phone},#{email},#{birth},#{user_nickname})
insert into usermarket(pk_user, title, price, content, filename) values(#{pk_user},#{title},#{price},#{content},#{filename})
mapper.select: select * from usermarket order by pk_usermarket desc
select pk_usermarket, pk_user, title, content, price, regdate from usermarket WHERE pk_usermarket= #{pk_usermarket}
mapper.update: update usermarket set title = #{title}, price= #{price},content = #{content}, filename- #{filename} WHERE pk_usermarket= #{pk_usermarket}
mapper.select: select * from usermarket where title like '%#{t_search}%' or content like '%#{t_search}%'
